page.title: 08Drayton Church Choirmaster
page.content: Mr Green,the choirmaster,was a cheerful man who loved children.In fact Mr Green was so nice that I don't know of anyone who disliked him.When our choir first began there were ten children but now there are only five.Last year Mr Green went on holiday and when he returned he bought us all a stick of rock.For a boy who is diabetic,he gave special chocolates. Sadly,though,in the November of last year,Mr Green died of cancer.It came as such a great shock to us all because no_one knew of his illness.After his death we gave his widow a bunch of flowers.
